title.narrative: NATIONAL CHILD PROTECTION SYSTEMS

description.narrative: 1.2.2 By 2017 the National Integrated Child Protection System (SNPI) has an established mechanism to monitor and evaluate its performance and results., which contributes to Access To Justice, Child Protection Systems, Child Protection â€“ General, Prevention And Response Services For Violence Against Children. UNICEF aims to achieve this through Advocacy And Public Engagement, Systems Strengthening And Institution Building. This contributes to the following Country Programme result: 1.2 By 2017, the capacity of the child protection system is increased to implement innovative strategies to prevent and protect children against the various forms of violence within the schools, families and the community

condition.narrative: Should contribute directly to results for children as outlined in the UNDAF, national results and/or UNICEF Strategic Plan and within the scope defined in the CPD, CPAP, OMP or other agreed upon programme documents

title.narrative: 1.2.2 By 2017 the National Integrated Child Protection System (SNPI) has an established mechanism to monitor and evaluate itsperformance and results.

description.narrative: Local policies for children and adolescents were issued from the CAI initiative and implemented in 32 municipalities. | Status:On-track | As-of Date:11/01/2018

title.narrative: Indicator 1.2.2.3: Periodic evaluations and follow-up mechanisms on the SNPI performance.

baseline.value: Current SNPI evaluation and follow-up mechanisms are weak.

actual.value: 2017:In process of elaboration of the proposal of monitoring and follow-up to the plan of implementation of the SNPI approved in 2016.

title.narrative: Indicator 1.2.2.2: An assessment on the SNPI and the eight-year plan that articulates the system with the National Policy for Children and Adolescents.

baseline.value: No current operational assessment of the SNPI.

target.value: 2015:An assessment completed by 2014 and an eight-year strategic plan by 2015.

actual.value: 2017:The process of revision of the SNPI has been finalized in 2016. IN 2017 has begun the stage of the implementation of the proposal that involves the revision of current legislation and regulations of the SNPI.

title.narrative: Indicator 1.2.2.1: By 2014, a conceptual/practical proposal for an improved SNPI.

baseline.value: There is no proposal for the operation of the SNPI.

target.value: 2016:By 2016, the proposal is being implemented in two of the regions with greatest vulnerability.

actual.value: 2017:The strategy for the implementation of the improvement proposal to the SNPI has been elaborated in 2016. In 2017, the CO support the implementation of the proposal.
